methods.name: makeProposalVote
methods.desc: Add one to the user contribution once it votes on a pool proposal

args.name: proposalId
args.desc: The id of the proposal to be voted on

args.name: inFavor
args.desc: If the vote is a yes or no vote

args.name: voterAddress
args.desc: The address for the voter - Meant for v1.0 while deployer "server" will be responsible to execute

args.name: votingPower
args.desc: The voting power of the voter

methods.name: slashUserVotingPower
methods.desc: Add one to the user contribution once it votes on a pool proposal

args.name: userAddress
args.desc: The address of the user to get its contribution slashed

args.name: proposalId
args.desc: used to define state of proposals to return

returns.desc: ProposalDataType Returns the proposal by id
